setEffects.4: Increases Charged Attack CRIT Rate by 30%.

flower.name: Heart of Comradeship
flower.desc: A small cerulean flower with somebody's ribbon pinned to the stem.

plume.name: Feather of Homecoming
plume.desc: A blue arrow fletching imbued with the sentiment of travelers that had once faded into the horizon.

sands.name: Sundial of the Sojourner
sands.desc: A sundial that has survived the ages, always silently recording the cycles of the sun and moon as they pass through the sky.

goblet.name: Goblet of the Sojourner
goblet.desc: A plain porcelain goblet that was once brimming with joyous brews.

circlet.name: Crown of Parting
circlet.desc: A reed coronet that emanates the spring breeze.
